name: LAB

steps.name: Sandbox
steps.title: Sandbox
steps.nextActionDescription: To progress the agent, request an Editor Concierge be assigned to your agent.
steps.tooltip:
Sandbox
This is the initial development stage where agents are created and configured. Agents in the Sandbox can only use synthesized data and are not connected to live systems. An Editor Concierge must be assigned to progress beyond this stage. You may request an Editor Concierge using the EYQ Agent Studio Support Teams Channel

steps.name: Proof of Concept and Q&A Pairs Testing
steps.title: Proof of Concept and QA Pairs Testing
steps.nextActionDescription: When stage requirements complete, Author submits for Editor approval.
steps.tooltip:
Proof of Concept and QA Pairs Testing
This phase validates the agent's value proposition, use case viability, and organizational alignment while testing Q&A pairs for reliability and accuracy. Stakeholders review documentation and confirm agents readiness to progress.
Agent Approval Process
The Agent Approval Process (AAP) governs approval for agents use in production and begins at this stage. Technical reviewers assess security compliance, data governance, architecture, and adherence to organizational standards. Promotion to the Pilot environment requires AI Factory Controller approval.
Stage Completion Requirements
This stage contains six mandatory steps that are tracked and reported. You are responsible for marking a check on each step once it is completed saving progress as you progress. You cannot progress until all six steps are complete. Accurate progression reporting enables leadership to monitor agent velocity and identify bottlenecks.
⚡ Progressing the Agent Requires:
Submit the business case documentation, execute the full test suite with the required pass rate, complete the Agent Approval Process, and secure Factory Controller approval.

tooltip:
About the Lab Stage
The Lab is the environment where agents are developed, configured, and associated with skills. While in the Lab, agents can only operate using synthesized data and are not connected to live production systems. Agents need an editor or concierge support person assigned in order to proceed from the Sandbox stage. You can request an editor or concierge for your agent using the EYQ Agent Studio support channel.

name: PILOT

steps.name: 5 Star Rating
steps.title: 5 Star Rating
steps.nextActionDescription: Editor is responsible for verifying feedback ratings and marking complete.
steps.tooltip:
5 Star Rating
Test the agent with client data and select user groups to gather real-world feedback, monitor performance, and validate business value. Participants provide ratings for the agent in the pilot environment, which accumulate into an average 5-star rating that reflects overall effectiveness and usability.
Progressing the Agent Requires: Coordinate with user groups in the pilot environment, collect feedback, and meet satisfaction criteria to proceed.

steps.name: AI Quality & Risk Management
steps.title: AI Quality & Risk Management
steps.nextActionDescription: After completing all stage requirements, the Author submits for Editor approval to promote the agent to Production.
steps.tooltip:
AI Quality and Risk Management
Governance review evaluating AI model risk, bias assessment, ethical considerations, regulatory compliance, and ongoing monitoring requirements before production release.
Progressing the Agent Requires:
Submit the AI risk assessment and monitoring plan, then await approval before publishing your agent.

tooltip:
Pilot Stage
In the Pilot stage, agents can use real client data and undergo performance testing to confirm that functionality and reliability are maintained under real-world scenarios. This phase validates business value and ensures the agent performs as expected before full deployment.

steps.name: Production Deployment
steps.title: Production Deployment
steps.tooltip:
Production Deployment
Successfully deployed to the production environment with full availability to all authorized users for organizational use.
⚡ Managing the Agent:
Monitor production performance and user feedback and maintain ongoing compliance. A member of the platform team will complete a manual human in the loop push, status will be pending governance until complete
